it.polimi.se2019.model.board

Class SkullsBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.board.SkullsBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SkullsBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    SkullsBoard keeps track of the remaining skulls and all the marks a player gets when someone is killed.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SkullsBoard

        public SkullsBoard(int totalSkulls)
            throws InvalidQuantityException
        Parameters:
        totalSkulls - is the number set at the beginning of a game, depending on how much the players want to game to last, it has to be in the [1,8] range
        Throws:
        InvalidQuantityException - if the skulls set is minor than 1 or greater than 8

    • Method Detail

      • addKillMarks

        public void addKillMarks(Character character,
                         int quantity)
                  throws InvalidCharacterException,
                         InvalidQuantityException
        Parameters:
        character - that killed someone
        quantity - depending on the kind of death(either kill 1 or overkill 2)
        Throws:
        InvalidCharacterException - if the character does not exist
        InvalidQuantityException - if trying to add more than 2 or less than 1 skulls
